name: Multi-Signature Treasury (Gnosis Safe)
description: M-of-N multisig wallet for DAO funds. Industry standard with extensive integrations.
when_to_use: All DAOs with significant funds, treasury management
benefits: Industry standard, flexible thresholds (e.g., 3-of-5), extensive integrations, batching
drawbacks: Coordination overhead, requires active signers, potential key loss
use_cases: DAO treasuries, protocol funds, community multisigs
